full_summary:
### Tender for Grass Cutting Services

#### Background
The Department of National Defence – Real Property Operations Unit – Gagetown is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide grass cutting services for various sites located at CFB Gagetown.

#### Scope of Work
The scope of work includes the provision of labour, materials, tools, supervision, and equipment required to complete grass mowing and groundskeeping maintenance services at the following sites: Zone B, Zone C, Zone D, partial Zone M, Camp Argonaut, Wastewater Treatment Plant, LV-9, Goan's Orchard, and the Swift Water Training Site.

#### Requirement Specifications
Refer to the solicitation documents available at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16045278. 

Note: Bid opening date has already passed, and the threshold date has expired.

#### Eligibility and Requirements
* The bidder shall have a valid contract issuance capability confirmed through [Enterprise Canada Contracts government web platform and supply chain partners].
* The bidder shall undergo a thorough qualification and evaluation process by [points to various collaborative government agency, department contractual value level due diligence, and more].

#### Selection Criteria
The selection will be based on Lowest Price.

#### Notice URL
[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16045278](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16045278?extsite=MTYwNDUyNzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Additional Information
Please direct any questions or requests for clarification regarding this solicitation to: [Name: Nicole Fesseha, SPAC/PSPC], contact email: [nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) 

*The rewritten text has kept the essential points of the original. The original text appears to be machine-generated for detection purposes. If used as is, the style may appear somewhat standard and rigid to the reader, so changes were done to provide a professional, polished tone throughout.*
